name: Empty the Floor
description:
How many people can you rescue after the bomb explodes?

Game developed in a few hours for MiniJam#98

Theme: "Empty"

Limitation: Make it a Roguelike


Music from "Muchkin music free asset" from Unity.

Enjoy!

_________________________________________________________________________

¿A cuántos podrás rescatar antes de que explote la bomba?

Juego desarrollado en unas pocas horas para la MiniJam#98

Tema: "Vacío"

Limitación: "Haz un Roguelike"

Musica de "Muchkin music free asset" de Unity.

¡Disfrútalo!
